25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ash-Sharid: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Delay in payment on the part of one who possesses means makes it lawful to dishonour and punish him. Ibn al-Mubarak said that "dishonour" means that he may be spoken to roughly and "punish" means he may be imprisoned for it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْحَبْسِ فِي الدَّيْنِ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding a person in debt, should he be detained?
